p: A review of the aspects of nutritional milk fat globules showed that the polar lipids are anticholesterolemic, reduce the number of aberrant crypt foci and adenocarcinomas, shift the tumor type of malignant tumors to benign, protect the liver from fat and cholesterol induced steatosis, suppress gastrointestinal pathogens, and assist in the maturation of the neonatal intestine and myelination of the developing central nervous system [ 42].
